nodes.text: Ultimate Battlestations was a planned sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game from Wizards of the Coast, originally to be published in late 2004. It was written by by Brian Campbell, Owen K.C. Stephens and Rodney Thompson. It was to feature ways to create space-station layouts for gamemasters and players. However, with Wizards' shift in emphasis to the Star Wars Miniatures game, the sourcebook was eventually cancelled.
